title: Russian Oligarch Roman Abramovich Puts Chelsea FC Up For Sale Amid Scrutiny
sub_head: Billionaire soccer club owner isn’t on any sanctions list, but some British lawmakers want him there
body:
LONDON—Russian tycoon Roman Abramovich said he would sell his soccer club Chelsea FC following calls by some British lawmakers for him to be sanctioned over his past ties to the Kremlin.
In a statement Mr. Abramovich said the decision was “incredibly difficult to make” and that the net proceeds from the sale would be given away to the victims of the war in Ukraine.
